name: Link (Blue Tunic - Breath of the Wild) LoRA
description:
Link (Blue Tunic - The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild) LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕


Oddly enough, there was no Blue Tunic Link on Civitai, so I made it. Should work fine on AnyLoRA, Anime Pastel Dream and NeverEnding Dream at around weight 1. Trigger word is link but using the legend of zelda, the legend of zelda: breath of the wild and blue tunic might help too. As usual, I didn't overload the trigger word, so you should still use descriptive words. This will allow you to use this "link toolset" to make new characters based on Link, or also have Link wear different stuff or improve your other Link lora/embeddings. This will also allow you to use it better with Latent Couple, as it will conflict less with other characters.

You can also make a female version of link like I did in the last examples.


How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight according to the instructions (by default it's :1)

meta.prompt: link, the legend of zelda, the legend of zelda: breath of the wild, 1boy, blue eyes, blue tunic, hood, hood up, leaf, light brown hair, looking at viewer, male focus, nature, open mouth, pointy ears, solo, water drop,  ((masterpiece)) <lora:link_offset:1>
